main event: A UFO sighting was documented in Saudi Arabia on 13 February 1961, involving a distinct boom and a cloud of smoke from a falling object.
interesting points: The observation lasted approximately 10 minutes., The object fell followed by a cloud of smoke., The object was determined to be a balloon or possibly a meteorite, but not an aircraft., The event was reportedly accompanied by a sonic boom and a rumble similar to distant thunder., Supplementary observations included possible fragments picked up from the beach area post-explosion.
sighted object: one unidentified object falling from the sky
witness description: senior officer and observer from the 21st Weather Squadron
